episode28.name: 28  Alabama, Missouri, and Dan Enos
episode28.description: We talk about the hogs week bouncing back with 2 SEC wins. Also have some interesting discussions on the Club Bert blocking controversy and Alex McDaniel's recent Jurassic Park viewing.
episode28.summary: The Hogs hoop squad went 2-0 last week, but the crew is still kind of  shaky. What's on their mind? After that, the guys look at the new  football assistant coach hires, touch on recruiting and talk about  Jurassic Park. Yes, Jurassic Park, the movie. Not the Lost World. We  hope you enjoy the show.
episode28.keywords: SEC, Arkansas, WPS, Razorbacks, The Hog Cast, Football, Basketball, Alex Mcdaniel,
